Posts.Content: Jul 28, 2015 10:20AM Xjerseygrl wrote: Hi Carol, I'm sorry your here too. Like you I was just diagnosed with IDC on July 20th and see the BS next Tuesday. I called my pcp and requested a copy of my pathology report and it has helped me get prepared for my appointment next week. I'm glad you joined as there is such a wealth of information to help us get thru this. I hope this helps you decide what is right for you....I agree with kaya the more information we have the better prepared we are to make important decisions regarding our treatment.
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed - is radiation and or chemo going to happen? Keyla Keyla
